Items.AgendaNote: Jointly with the Committee on Health

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the appropriate Committee of the Council of the City of New York to hold hearings on the New York City Department of Health and Mental Hygiene's expansion of the Bushwick rat abatement program to neighborhoods in the South Bronx, Manhattan and Brooklyn, and further calling on the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene to expand the rat abatement program to apply throughout the entire City of New York.
Items.MatterName: Expansion of the Bushwick rat abatement program.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the creation of a pest control board.
Items.MatterName: Creation of a pest control board.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing minimum fines for the violation of or nonconformance with provisions of the health code or any other applicable law, rule or regulation pertaining to the eradication of rodents, the elimination of rodent harborages or other rodent related nuisances.
Oversight - The Rodent Epidemic - Assessing the Problem and Implementing Affirmative Ongoing Solutions.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - The Rodent Epidemic - Assessing the Problem and Implementing Affirmative Ongoing Solutions.

Items.Title: Oversight - The Rodent Epidemic - Assessing the Problem and Implementing Affirmative Ongoing Solutions.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - The Rodent Epidemic - Assessing the Problem and Implementing Affirmative Ongoing Solutions.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing minimum fines for the violation of or nonconformance with provisions of the health code or any other applicable law, rule or regulation pertaining to the eradication of rodents, the elimination of rodent harborages or other rodent related nuisances.
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the creation of a pest control board.
Items.MatterName: Creation of a pest control board.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the appropriate Committee of the Council of the City of New York to hold hearings on the New York City Department of Health and Mental Hygiene's expansion of the Bushwick rat abatement program to neighborhoods in the South Bronx, Manhattan and Brooklyn, and further calling on the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene to expand the rat abatement program to apply throughout the entire City of New York.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Stewart, Sears, Vann, Clarke and Oddo.
